title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Boil pasta in salted water until al dente.
Fry bacon until crispy.
Whisk eggs and Parmesan in a bowl.
Drain pasta and toss with bacon and egg mixture off the heat.
Serve immediately with extra Parmesan.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and tikka masala paste for at least 1 hour.
Grill or pan-fry chicken until cooked through.
Prepare tomato-based gravy in a pan.
Add chicken pieces and simmer for 10 minutes.
Finish with cream and serve with rice or naan.

title: Veggie Stir Fry
summary: A quick and healthy vegetable stir fry packed with flavor and crunch.
instructions: Heat sesame oil in a wok or pan.
Add ginger and stir-fry for 30 seconds.
Add vegetables and stir-fry for 3–4 minutes.
Pour soy sauce and toss until veggies are tender but crisp.
Serve hot over steamed rice or noodles.

title: Chocolate Lava Cake
summary: A rich chocolate cake with a gooey molten center served warm.
instructions: Preheat oven to 200°C (400°F).
Melt chocolate and butter together until smooth.
Whisk eggs and sugar until light and fluffy.
Fold chocolate mixture and flour into egg mixture.
Pour batter into greased ramekins and bake for 10–12 minutes.
Serve warm with ice cream.
